A hacking cough is loud and sounds painful: He is constantly puffing on cigarettes and has a hacking cough. Synonym
hacky
More examplesFewer examplesSome of the blood pressure and cardiac medications cause a dry hacking cough.She had a hacking dry cough and felt sick.The disease in adults typically causes a long lasting hacking, generally non-productive, cough.Someone coughed, hoarse and hacking.

hacking noun [U]
(COMPUTING)
the activity of getting into someone else's computer system without permission in order to find out information or do something illegal: Companies installing broadband were worried that such an open and permanent link to the internet would make them more vulnerable to hacking.hacking attack The FBI is probing the biggest ever hacking attack on the internet.
More examplesFewer examplesComputer hacking is not a crime under Filipino law.Ethical hacking is becoming increasingly necessary for our survival.

hacking noun [U]
(HORSE RIDING)
mainly UK the activity of riding on a horse in the countryside for pleasure: go hacking I go hacking on the Heath trail first thing every morning. Most horses are used today for pleasure riding, for example hacking and pulling traps.
More examplesFewer examplesI love just jumping on my pony and going hacking.You don't have to spend much money for basic hacking and general enjoyment of your horse.
